title: Hydration reminder
message: Take a sip of water — staying hydrated helps your tests be accurate.
followUp: Would you like recommendations based on your latest blood test?

title: Stretch Break
message: Stand up and stretch for 2 minutes — small breaks matter.
followUp: I can also check your recent tests if you'd like.

title: Short Walk
message: A 5 minute walk helps circulation. Try it now!
followUp: Want me to check any reports?
